amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in House Report 118-158 to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act from enforcing any COVID-19 mask mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 211 (Roll no. 374).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Rosendale.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 211 (Roll no. 374).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
